spellLines.description: Damage over time spell line using insect swarms

spells.name: Stinging Insects
spells.description: Summons stinging insects to attack the target

spells.description: Summons a stinging swarm to attack the target

spells.name: Provoking Swarm
spells.description: Summons a provoking swarm to attack the target

spells.name: Deadly Swarm
spells.description: Summons a deadly swarm to attack the target

spells.name: Dooming Swarm
spells.description: Summons a dooming swarm to attack the target

spells.name: Killing Swarm
spells.description: Summons a killing swarm to attack the target

spells.name: Death Swarm
spells.description: Summons a death swarm to attack the target

spellLines.description: Defensive spell line that damages attackers

spells.name: Bristles
spells.description: Covers the caster in bristles that damage attackers

spells.name: Bristleskin
spells.description: Covers the caster in bristleskin that damages attackers

spells.name: Bristlepelt
spells.description: Covers the caster in bristlepelt that damages attackers

spells.name: Barbed Skin
spells.description: Covers the caster in barbed skin that damages attackers

spells.name: Thornskin
spells.description: Covers the caster in thornskin that damages attackers

spells.name: Spineskin
spells.description: Covers the caster in spineskin that damages attackers

spells.name: Quillskin
spells.description: Covers the caster in quillskin that damages attackers

spellLines.description: Area effect damage spell line using wind and storms

spells.name: Squall
spells.description: Creates a small squall to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Twirl
spells.description: Creates a twirling wind to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: Creates a cyclone to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Whirlwind
spells.description: Creates a whirlwind to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Waterspout
spells.description: Creates a waterspout to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Tempest
spells.description: Creates a tempest to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Typhoon
spells.description: Creates a typhoon to damage nearby enemies

spells.name: Strike of Thunder
spells.description: Strikes the target with thunder

spells.name: Strike of Storms
spells.description: Strikes the target with storms

spells.name: Bolt of Storms
spells.description: Hurls a bolt of storms at the target

spells.name: Thunderbolt
spells.description: Hurls a thunderbolt at the target

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: Hurls a lightning bolt at the target
